Summary: Multiple flashing mutli colored spheres closely grouped together.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving to work about 9pm, Sunday May 17 2009. I light movement in the sky caught my eye. I pulled over so I could see it better. It was a made of mutlple sphere flashing various colors. It was not an airplane that I had seen. It was heading S My son claimed a few days ago that he had seen an object. His drawing were very simlair to what I had seen.
